alert.note: Alert for Coastal Horry (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 12 at 7:17PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Horry County through 745 PM EDT... At 717 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Myrtle Beach, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Myrtle Beach, Surfside Beach, Myrtle Beach Airport, Socastee, Springmaid Pier, Forestbrook and Grand Strand Regional Medical Center. This includes SC Highway 31 between mile markers 5 and 14. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
